thread.section_title: The Waldorf Hilton London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel
thread.title_full: Nice hotel - Review of The Waldorf Hilton London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: MEB505
title: Nice hotel
text:
I just realised I hadn't written a review from my stay at The Waldorf in 2015.
The Waldorf Hotel is old but very nice, our room was very small, but clean, Breakfast was plentiful and being that its close to Central London has a lot going for it. Covent Garden and all the Theatres are within walking distance, Buses and Taxi's stop right outside the front entrance and Holborn station is a 10 minute walk away.
The staff were very helpful and we enjoyed our week stay
